title: Recovery Act PowerPoint Presented by Jared Bernstein | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 08, 2009

 



Recovery Act PowerPoint Presented by Jared Bernstein




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                               June 8, 2009   Below please find the link to a PowerPoint presentation on the implementation of the Recovery Act that Jared Bernstein, the Vice President’s chief economist, will present at the beginning of the Daily Press Briefing this afternoon: http://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/files/documents/recovery/MapsPowerPointPresentation.pptx
